name: Black Lotus - Alpha Development
description:
[Page in Progress]

Step right up, Step right in, to Black Lotus! 

A multiplayer first person shooter inspired by yesteryear, built on a custom engine! 

During this Alpha development phase, Black Lotus is PWYW (Pay-What-You-Want) Donationware.  You may download it for free, but if you feel as though you'd like to support the project, this and spreading the word is how 💪
